entry.title: On consensus changes in bitcoin 2024
entry.summary: The primary objective in the development of Bitcoin is to enhance its scalability and ensure that it is well-suited for future generations. This goal surpasses the mere avoidance of immediate difficulties; it focuses on the long-term improvement and expansion of the network. By concentrating on these aspects, the efforts are directed towards ensuring that Bitcoin can handle a growing user base and evolving use cases, thereby solidifying its position as a robust and reliable digital currency. The emphasis is on creating a sustainable system that can adapt and thrive over time, benefiting users not just currently but far into the future.
